verses.verse: Every <S%H2454>wise<s%> <S%H802>woman<s%> <S%H1129>buildeth<s%> her <S%H1004>house<s%>; But the <S%H200>foolish<s%> plucketh it <S%H2040>down<s%> with her own <S%H3027>hands<s%>.
He that <S%H1980>walketh<s%> in his <S%H3476>uprightness<s%> <S%H3373>feareth<s%> <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>; But he that is <S%H3868>perverse<s%> in his <S%H1870>ways<s%> despiseth <S%H959>him<s%>.
In the <S%H6310>mouth<s%> of the <S%H191>foolish<s%> is a <S%H2415>rod<s%> for his <S%H1346>pride<s%>; But the <S%H8193>lips<s%> of the <S%H2450>wise<s%> shall preserve <S%H8104>them<s%>.
Where no <S%H504>oxen<s%> <S%H18>are<s%>, the crib is <S%H1249>clean<s%>; But <S%H7230>much<s%> <S%H8393>increase<s%> is by the <S%H3581>strength<s%> of the <S%H7794>ox<s%>.
A <S%H529>faithful<s%> <S%H5707>witness<s%> will not <S%H3577>lie<s%>; But a <S%H8267>false<s%> <S%H5707>witness<s%> <S%H6315>uttereth<s%> <S%H3576>lies<s%>.
A <S%H3887>scoffer<s%> <S%H1245>seeketh<s%> <S%H2451>wisdom<s%>, and findeth it <S%H1847>not<s%>; But knowledge is <S%H7043>easy<s%> unto him that hath <S%H995>understanding<s%>.
Go <S%H3212><s%> into the <S%H5048>presence<s%> of a <S%H3684>foolish<s%> <S%H376>man<s%>, And thou shalt not <S%H3045>perceive<s%> in him the <S%H8193>lips<s%> of <S%H1847>knowledge<s%>.
The <S%H2451>wisdom<s%> of the <S%H6175>prudent<s%> is to <S%H995>understand<s%> his <S%H1870>way<s%>; But the <S%H200>folly<s%> of <S%H3684>fools<s%> is <S%H4820>deceit<s%>.
A <S%H817>trespass-offering<s%> <S%H3887>mocketh<s%> <S%H191>fools<s%>; But among the <S%H3477>upright<s%> there is good <S%H7522>will<s%>.
The <S%H3820>heart<s%> <S%H3045>knoweth<s%> its <S%H5315>own<s%> <S%H4787>bitterness<s%>; And a <S%H2114>stranger<s%> doth not <S%H6148>intermeddle<s%> with its <S%H8057>joy<s%>.
The <S%H1004>house<s%> of the <S%H7563>wicked<s%> shall be <S%H8045>overthrown<s%>; But the <S%H168>tent<s%> of the <S%H3477>upright<s%> shall <S%H6524>flourish<s%>.
There <S%H3426>is<s%> a <S%H1870>way<s%> which seemeth <S%H3477>right<s%> <S%H6440>unto<s%> a <S%H376>man<s%>; But the <S%H319>end<s%> thereof are the <S%H1870>ways<s%> of <S%H4194>death<s%>.
Even in <S%H7814>laughter<s%> the <S%H3820>heart<s%> is <S%H3510>sorrowful<s%>; And the <S%H319>end<s%> of <S%H8057>mirth<s%> is <S%H8424>heaviness<s%>.
The <S%H5472>backslider<s%> in <S%H3820>heart<s%> shall be <S%H7646>filled<s%> with his own <S%H1870>ways<s%>; And a <S%H2896>good<s%> man shall be satisfied from <S%H376>himself<s%>.
The <S%H6612>simple<s%> <S%H539>believeth<s%> every <S%H1697>word<s%>; But the <S%H6175>prudent<s%> man looketh <S%H995>well<s%> to his <S%H838>going<s%>.
A <S%H2450>wise<s%> man <S%H3373>feareth<s%>, and <S%H5493>departeth<s%> from <S%H7451>evil<s%>; But the <S%H3684>fool<s%> beareth himself <S%H5674>insolently<s%>, and is <S%H982>confident<s%>.
He that is <S%H7116>soon<s%> <S%H639>angry<s%> will <S%H6213>deal<s%> <S%H200>foolishly<s%>; And a <S%H376>man<s%> of wicked <S%H4209>devices<s%> is <S%H8130>hated<s%>.
The <S%H6612>simple<s%> <S%H5157>inherit<s%> <S%H200>folly<s%>; But the <S%H6175>prudent<s%> are <S%H3803>crowned<s%> with <S%H1847>knowledge<s%>.
The <S%H7451>evil<s%> <S%H7817>bow<s%> down <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H2896>good<s%>; And the <S%H7563>wicked<s%>, at the <S%H8179>gates<s%> of the <S%H6662>righteous<s%>.
The <S%H7326>poor<s%> is <S%H8130>hated<s%> even of his own <S%H7453>neighbor<s%>; But the <S%H6223>rich<s%> hath <S%H7227>many<s%> <S%H157>friends<s%>.
He that <S%H936>despiseth<s%> his <S%H7453>neighbor<s%> <S%H2398>sinneth<s%>; But he that hath <S%H2603>pity<s%> on the <S%H6035>poor<s%>, happy is <S%H835>he<s%>.
Do they not <S%H8582>err<s%> that <S%H2790>devise<s%> <S%H7451>evil<s%>? But <S%H2617>mercy<s%> and <S%H571>truth<s%> shall be to them that <S%H2790>devise<s%> <S%H2896>good<s%>.
In all <S%H6089>labor<s%> there is <S%H4195>profit<s%>; But the <S%H1697>talk<s%> of the <S%H8193>lips<s%> tendeth only to <S%H4270>penury<s%>.
The <S%H5850>crown<s%> of the <S%H2450>wise<s%> is their <S%H6239>riches<s%>; But the <S%H200>folly<s%> of <S%H3684>fools<s%> is only <S%H200>folly<s%>.
A <S%H571>true<s%> <S%H5707>witness<s%> <S%H5337>delivereth<s%> <S%H5315>souls<s%>; But he that <S%H6315>uttereth<s%> <S%H3577>lies<s%> causeth <S%H4820>deceit<s%>.
In the <S%H3374>fear<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> is <S%H5797>strong<s%> <S%H4009>confidence<s%>; And his <S%H1121>children<s%> shall have a place of <S%H4268>refuge<s%>.
The <S%H3374>fear<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> is a <S%H4726>fountain<s%> of <S%H2416>life<s%>, That one may <S%H5493>depart<s%> from the <S%H4170>snares<s%> of <S%H4194>death<s%>.

In the <S%H7230>multitude<s%> of <S%H5971>people<s%> is the <S%H4428>king<s%>'s <S%H1927>glory<s%>; But in the <S%H657>want<s%> of <S%H3816>people<s%> is the <S%H4288>destruction<s%> of the <S%H7333>prince<s%>.
He that is <S%H750>slow<s%> to <S%H639>anger<s%> is of <S%H7227>great<s%> <S%H8394>understanding<s%>; But he that is <S%H7116>hasty<s%> of <S%H7307>spirit<s%> <S%H7311>exalteth<s%> <S%H200>folly<s%>.
A <S%H4832>tranquil<s%> <S%H3820>heart<s%> is the <S%H2416>life<s%> of the <S%H1320>flesh<s%>; But <S%H7068>envy<s%> is the <S%H7538>rottenness<s%> of the <S%H6106>bones<s%>.
He that <S%H6231>oppresseth<s%> the <S%H1800>poor<s%> <S%H2778>reproacheth<s%> his <S%H6213>Maker<s%>; But he that hath <S%H2603>mercy<s%> on the <S%H34>needy<s%> honoreth <S%H3513>him<s%>.
The <S%H7563>wicked<s%> is thrust <S%H1760>down<s%> in his <S%H7451>evil-doing<s%>; But the <S%H6662>righteous<s%> hath a <S%H2620>refuge<s%> in his <S%H4194>death<s%>.

Wisdom <S%H2451><s%> <S%H5117>resteth<s%> in the <S%H3820>heart<s%> of him that hath <S%H995>understanding<s%>; But that which is in the <S%H7130>inward<s%> part of <S%H3684>fools<s%> is made <S%H3045>known<s%>.
Righteousness <S%H6666><s%> <S%H7311>exalteth<s%> a <S%H1471>nation<s%>; But <S%H2403>sin<s%> is a <S%H2617>reproach<s%> to any <S%H3816>people<s%>.
The <S%H4428>king<s%>'s <S%H7522>favor<s%> is toward a <S%H5650>servant<s%> that dealeth <S%H7919>wisely<s%>; But his <S%H5678>wrath<s%> will be against him that causeth <S%H954>shame<s%>.
